comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: What a colorful operation, unfortunately short lived.  Here the ground workers are about to remove a box containing a male South American tapid for the San Diego zoo, to join several females already there.  Comment by the photographer, I. E. Quastler

comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Oops, that should read tapir!  As far as I know, this operation was primarily to take freight to SAN for United.
